Vocab 1

nun'ji

my head

nusapun...nusapunn

my (single) hair...my hair(s)

'ns'tuaqan...'ns'tuaqann-

my ear...my ears

'npugug...'npugugl

my eye...my eyes

'nsisqon

my nose

nitn...nitnn

my nostril...my nostrils

ntun

my mouth

'nsi...'nsi'l

my lip...my lips

nipit...nipitl

my tooth...my teeth

'ntugwejan

my forehead

'ntugwape'gn

my chin

nijinuan...nijinuann

my cheek...my cheeks

'nsisgw

my face

'nqotaqan

my throat

'nji'taqan

my neck

'ntlmaqan...ntlmaqann

my shoulder...my shoulders

'npitnoqom...npitnoqoml

my arm...my arms

'ntlusgnignm...'ntlusgnignmg

my elbow...my elbows

'npitn...'npitnn

my hand...my hands

'ntijin...ntijinn

my thumb...my thumbs

'npusgun

my chest

'npaqam

my back

nmusti

my belly

nili

my bellybutton

'ngat...'ngatl

my foot/leg...my feet/legs

nulugun...nulugunn

my thigh...my thighs

'njigun...'njigung

my knee...my knees

'ngajign...'ngajignn

my lower leg...my l ower legs

'nqon...nqong

nmaqaqjigeweim...nmaqaqjigeweiml

'ngamlamun

my heart

'npn...npng

nligsi...nligsi'l
